newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINNISH 8-MTH BEVERAGES SALES FALL 0.9 PCT YR/YR.
newsitem.headline: FINNISH 8-MTH BEVERAGES SALES FALL 0.9 PCT YR/YR.

text.p: Sales in Finland of beer, soft drinks and moneral waters fell 0.9 percent year-on-year in January-August to 480.2 million litres, the Federation of the Brewing and Soft Drinks Industry said on Tuesday.
